snippet: It's important to focus on the clues we get about the judgment of a presidential hopeful - especially when it comes to foreign policy. Mitt Romney has no experience in this area.
abstract: It's important to focus on the clues we get about the judgment of a presidential hopeful - especially when it comes to foreign policy. Mitt Romney has no experience in this area.

headline.main: Mitt Romney, Dick Cheney, Condi Rice and Other Scary Stories
